doc.field: Folders contain memoirs of Munn received from H. Thomas Austern - July, 1979. (Includes memorandum by B. Parnes re meeting between H.T. Austern Bayrd Still, Alexander Baltzly - Jan. 1976. Written at request of William L. Blackwell, Chairman, History Department). Margaret L. Brown - April 20, 1979 (Bayrd Still oral history interview). Benjamin Butner - see Sept 15, 1979 letter to Bayrd Still. Series I, Folder 5. Rabbi Armond E. Cohen - Jan. 25, 1982 letter to Dean Jill N. Claster, WSUC Miguel A. de Capriles - May, 1976 (Excerpts, Bayrd Still oral history interview). Jacob Fisher - 1978 (See also: Jacob Fisher, On Vanishing Ground, 1979, NYU Archives, Rz 1). John Frost - Bulletin (of NYU Libraries); article, 1964; letter, 1979. Isidore S. Immerman - Sept. 13, 1979 (Transcript of discussion with Bayrd Still). Sidney Leibowitz - June, 1979. James L. Mandel - Sept. 2, 1979 (Includes list of letters from Mandell to Munn Located in Munn Collection, Harvard University Library). Bernard Newman - Sept 14, 1979 Teresa Newman - Sept. 5, 1979 Charles Norman - See: Charles Norman, The Well of the Past, 1949. NYU Archives, Rz 2; Poets and People, 1972, NYU Archives, Rz 3. Leon Pomerance - Sept. 1, 1979 George Saslow - July, 1979 Hilda G. Schwartz - Sept. 20, 1979 William R. Taylor - May 27, 1980.
